name: ADRD Differential Diagnoses
content: Differential diagnoses for cognitive impairment: Delirium, Acute confusional state, Depression, Pseudodementia, Normal aging, Age-related cognitive decline, Benign senescent forgetfulness, Medication-induced cognitive impairment, Normal pressure hydrocephalus, NPH, Brain tumor, Subdural hematoma, Chronic subdural hematoma, Alcohol-related dementia, Wernicke-Korsakoff, Autoimmune encephalitis, Limbic encephalitis, Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease, CJD, Huntington disease, Progressive supranuclear palsy, PSP, Corticobasal degeneration, CBD, Multiple sclerosis, Parkinson disease dementia, PDD
